AI Description: The SummarizedExperiment container in R is a flexible data structure that integrates assay data, sample information, and experimental metadata. It provides a unified way to store and manipulate high-throughput biological data, such as genomic data, transcriptomic data, proteomic data, and more. SummarizedExperiment is widely used in bioinformatics and computational biology for data organization and analysis.
Core Features: Integration Of Assay Data, Sample Information, & Metadata, Flexible & Scalable Data Structure, Support For High-Throughput Biological Data Analysis, Compatible With Various Bioinformatics Tools & Packages In The Bioconductor Ecosystem
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Data Analysis, R Package
